title: Windows_8_Professional_x86[vLite Repak]
description:
Description

Windows 8 Professional 32-bit Install

Torrent was created using vLite (Windows Vista Configuration Tool) to build the 32-bit image. It is much smaller (2.66GB) than the Microsoft Windows 8 Pro 32_64 bit installer package. 

Top 10 Windows 8 Features

1. The secret Start menu: right-click in the lower-left corner to bring up a   Start menu.
2. Sync your settings: user account that's linked to your Windows ID, and pulls in information 
 from SkyDrive, Xbox, Hotmail/Outlook and other cloud services. 
3. Windows Defender: Windows 8 comes with Windows Defender with added anti-virus capabilities.
4. Simple shutdown: Alt+F4
5. Built-in screenshots: WIN+PrtScn
6. Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+Tab
7. Snap your Apps: dock a Start page app to the side while you work on the desktop.
8. File History: new file history backup tool
9. ISO support: launch ISOs (and VHD files) natively.
10. Reinstall Windows: Windows 8 reset tool does away with complicated reinstall routine
